12/ Ratio of trading to transacting can reveal which asset is being speculated upon more on a relative basis. Global FX volumes are 10x greater (~$750T/yr) than global GDP (~$80T in 2017), while global bitcoin trading (~$1.4B/day) is only 2x > transaction volume (~$750B/day). pic.twitter.com/CRFD9cVw3j
